review: Love the fire stick.  Easy to set up and for the price, it's an awesome device.
author: P. Stevens "Books = Knowledge and Power"

review: I am using Fire stick for sling TV. All the HD channels are Cominh properly but non_HD channels are not displaying in the full screen. It's like small TV within my 65-inch TV. I checked with my friend who is using roku and he is not facing any issue. Kindly advice
author: Tejveer Singh

review: Very terrible product. I am so very unimpressed that i could scream. All i wanted was a little something to stream netflix on, is that to much to ask? Had this for 2 days and now nothing will play, says my connection is very good but wont load?
author: Zachary

review: Somewhat disappointed - Some incidents following an ad, the sound is there but one is presented with a black screen. The power supply overheated on the one I first purchased, While awaiting delivery of the replacement, I bought a Roku2. Installed the Fire Stick on a secondary TV. .
author: Bill Keller

review: One of the best devices I have
author: Amazon Customer

review: Why oh why did I succumb to the advertising?  I have tried everything, and it does not work!
author: Nancy A. Foster

review: Simple easy to use ,great reception,real value and quality product
author: Ken Bolen
